#summary burner skin for StreamedMP installation
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy,Phase-Support

= Introduction =

There is a problem with burner and StreamedMP. StreamedMP does not provide skin files for burner.


= Details =

To make burner works with StreamedMP you need:
    # Download http://burner-for-mp.googlecode.com/files/StreamedMP.zip
    # Unzip it to X:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Team MediaPortal\MediaPortal\skin\
